STOCKORDER_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE w2_StockOrder.shop_id = @shop_id AND ( (@stock_order_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_StockOrder.stock_order_id LIKE @stock_order_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') AND (@relation_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_StockOrder.relation_id LIKE @relation_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') AND (@order_status = '' OR @order_status = w2_StockOrder.order_status) AND (@delivery_status = '' OR @delivery_status = w2_StockOrder.delivery_status) AND (@order_date_from IS NULL OR w2_StockOrder.order_date >= @order_date_from) AND (@order_date_to IS NULL OR w2_StockOrder.order_date < @order_date_to) AND (@delivery_date_from IS NULL OR w2_StockOrder.delivery_date >= @delivery_date_from) AND (@delivery_date_to IS NULL OR w2_StockOrder.delivery_date < @delivery_date_to) AND (@product_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_StockOrder.stock_order_id IN ( SELECT w2_StockOrderItem.stock_order_id FROM w2_StockOrderItem WHERE w2_StockOrderItem.shop_id = @shop_id AND (w2_StockOrderItem.product_id LIKE @product_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' OR w2_StockOrderItem.variation_id LIKE @product_id_like_escaped+ '%' ESCAPE '#') ) ) )

STOCKORDER_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 1 THEN w2_StockOrder.stock_order_id ELSE 1 END ASC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 2 THEN w2_StockOrder.stock_order_id ELSE 1 END DESC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 3 THEN w2_StockOrder.order_date WHEN 5 THEN w2_StockOrder.delivery_date ELSE NULL END ASC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 4 THEN w2_StockOrder.order_date WHEN 6 THEN w2_StockOrder.delivery_date ELSE NULL END DESC, -- 常に一定の結果セットを得るため、主キー（昇順）ソート w2_StockOrder.shop_id ASC, w2_StockOrder.stock_order_id ASC
